About This Game
Become a true hero! This breathtaking flight simulator lets you become a lifesaving pilot. You are put right into the cockpit of an emergency helicopter and being able to accomplish more than 40 challenging missions that feature multiple goals in a brand new area. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s time to take off!
